aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph_one: Hello, I'm Alla - Frontend developer from Moscow. I am interested in development and everything connected with it.
aboutMe.paragraph_two: A frontend developer with over a year of experience in creating SPA and SSR applications, working with TypeScript, React, Redux, and Next.js.
aboutMe.paragraph_three: Ready to implement great projects with wonderful people.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Want to know more or just chat? You are welcome!
